body_html:
I think the issue is that _access instead of wchar_t version of _waccess is used for FileExists:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/windows/windows_file_system.cc#L383-L389

Created a PR #17697 for _waccess, though it might be good to avoid unicode in Windows if possible, as it may not be well supported.
body_text:
I think the issue is that _access instead of wchar_t version of _waccess is used for FileExists:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/windows/windows_file_system.cc#L383-L389
Created a PR #17697 for _waccess, though it might be good to avoid unicode in Windows if possible, as it may not be well supported.
body:
I think the issue is that `_access` instead of wchar_t version of `_waccess` is used for `FileExists`:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/windows/windows_file_system.cc#L383-L389

Created a PR #17697 for _waccess, though it might be good to avoid unicode in Windows if possible, as it may not be well supported.
